org.eclipse.help

Class AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.help.AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider

  • public abstract class AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider
extends Object
    An AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider is a mechanism to provide display name for criteria attached to toc or topic. AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProviders must be registered via the org.eclipse.help.criteriaDefinition extension point.
    Since:
    3.5

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider()

      Returns all criteria definition contributions for this provider.

      • AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider

        public AbstractCriteriaDefinitionProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • getCriteriaDefinitionContributions

        public abstract ICriteriaDefinitionContribution[] getCriteriaDefinitionContributions(String locale)
        Returns all criteria definition contributions for this provider. Providers are free to provide any number of contributions (zero or more).
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale for which to get contributions
        Returns:
        all the criteria definition contributions for this provider
